## âš”ï¸ Model Tiers: Choose Your Weapon! {.smaller visibility="hidden"}

Most model providers offer a range of models, often tiered by capability and cost:

<!-- ::: {.incremental .smaller} -->
::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="33%"}

### ğŸ‘‘ Flagship Models

```{=html}
<ul style="list-style-type: none; font-size: 0.9em;">
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #859900;">âœ…</span> Complex reasoning, high accuracy, creative tasks.</li>
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #dc322f;">âš ï¸</span> Slower, more expensive.</li>
</ul>
```

*Examples: OpenAI o1, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Llama 4 Behemoth*

:::

::: {.column width="33%"}
### âš–ï¸ Balanced Models

```{=html}
<ul style="list-style-type: none; font-size: 0.9em;">
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #859900;">âœ…</span> Good balance of performance, speed, and cost for general use.</li>
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #dc322f;">âš ï¸</span> May not match flagship on the <em>most</em> complex tasks.</li>
</ul>
```

*Examples: GPT-4o, Claude 3.7 Sonnet (Non reasoning)*
:::

::: {.column width="33%"}
### âš¡ Fast/Lite Models

```{=html}
<ul style="list-style-type: none; font-size: 0.9em;">
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #859900;">âœ…</span> High throughput, low latency, simple tasks, cost-sensitive applications.</li>
  <li style="margin-bottom: 0.8em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 1.2em; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: #dc322f;">âš ï¸</span> Less capable reasoning, potentially lower accuracy.</li>
</ul>
```

*Examples: GPT-4o-mini, Claude 3.5 Haiku, Gemini 2.0 Flash and Flash-lite*
:::
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in-then-semi-out}
**Key takeaway:** Match the model tier to your specific needs and budget!
:::
